quotes.quote: I definitely know that I'm quirky. I know that I'm different. Red hair definitely made me different growing up.
My husband said he wanted to have a relationship with a redhead, so I dyed my hair.
I love being a redhead. It's a rare thing, so I think there's a bond between redheads.
There is more, much more, to being a redhead than the color of one's hair.
When you're younger, being a redhead is... Well, my two brothers teased me no end.
When red-headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
It was dreadful. They tried to put the little redhead in a cage.
In British culture, redheads get teased at school. But I've grown up enough to realize I love my hair.
You can sleep with a blonde, you can sleep with a brunette, but you'll never get any sleep with a redhead!
Redheaded women! Those blood oranges! Those cherry bombs! Those celestial shrews! And queens of copp! â€“ ode to redheads.
Redheads keep the world on fire and men's hearts ablaze.
While the rest of the species is descended from apes, redheads are descended from cats.
All the action adventure girls have red hair. Whenever it is an independent girl, not a sidekick person, when she has her own mind or does as good as the guys, she has red hair.
I'm ready to be an action figure. I'd love that very much. And all the redheaded kids will get to go out and feel loved and be able to buy a redheaded action figure.
Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead.
Red hair, sir, in my opinion, is dangerous.
With the red hair, you get the white skin; it's a package deal. The cons are that you never look particularly attractive on the beach. The pros are in a softly lit room, you look pretty.
Having red hair is never good when you're a kid. I was picked on a lot and didn't have a lot of friends. But I think that gave me a thick skin and helped make me a better person.
People were making fun of redheads before I came along.
We redheads are a minority, we tend to notice each other - you know, and notice our identity.
I am for sure a redhead and there aren't that many of us out there in music.
If you're betwixt and between, trust the one with red hair.
Redheaded women buck like goats.
It's my red hair that interferes with my good sense. All that color so close to my brain, it plum disorients me most days.
The blood of a redheaded woman is three degrees cooler than the blood of a normal woman. This has been established by medical studies.
I love having my hair and makeup done for red carpets, but to have that done every day would be exhausting.
Red hair is great. It's rare, and therefore superior.
You'd find it easier to be bad than good if you had red hair.
Red hair is my life long sorrow.
I'm stronger and sassier as a redhead.
